Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Raphael:

Text.Language: Marenouwst m~Viwt nem Ps/ri: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: n~tentaio~ n~Rava/l: pimahsomt n~ar,/aggeloc.
Let us worship the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit, and honor Raphael the third of the archangels.
